ComicInfo.Title: Until the Spring
ComicInfo.Summary: The amazing conclusion to the 4-part "The Year After." A mysterious death at the Farm, like the ones that have been plaguing Fabletown, mars the first birthday of Snowâ€™s offspring. Is this silent killer another attack from the Adversary, or something even more terrifying?
